investigation.title: Investigation Form
investigation.bmReasonRequired: You need to fill BM Reason
investigation.percentagesRequired: Please ensure responsibility percentages total 100% in each section.
investigation.percentagesMustInclude: percentages must include Company, User, and Income.
investigation.percentagesMustIncludeForSection: {{section}} percentages must include Company, User, and Income.

messages.pleaseFillRequired: Please check the form and fill all required fields.
messages.investigationRequired: Please fill the investigation form (BM Reason and percentages must total 100%) before approving.
messages.missingFormIdentifier: Missing form identifier. Please refresh and try again.
messages.pdfGenerateFailed: Failed to download PDF. Please try again.
messages.pdfFormIdNotFound: Unable to generate PDF: Form ID not found
messages.authRequired: Authentication required. Please log in again.
messages.addProductRequired: Please add at least one product before submitting.
messages.productCodeRequired: Please provide a product code for each item.
messages.submittingWithWarnings: Submitting form with empty fields. You can still proceed.

errors.authTokenNotFound: Authentication token not found. Please log in again.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action. Please log in again.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found. Please check if the form exists.
errors.validationError: Validation error. Please check your input and try again.

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.pleaseFillRequired: Please fill in all required fields:

errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.networkError: Network connection failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.noResponse: No response received from server. Please try again.
errors.invalidResponse: Invalid response from server. Please try again.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.formSubmitFailed: Failed to submit form. Please try again.
errors.formUpdateFailed: Failed to update form. Please try again.
errors.formDeleteFailed: Failed to delete form. Please try again.
errors.formLoadFailed: Failed to load form data. Please refresh the page.
errors.fileUploadFailed: Failed to upload file. Please try again.
errors.fileTooLarge: File size is too large. Please upload a smaller file.
errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a supported file format.
errors.pdfAuthFailed: Authentication failed while generating PDF. Please log in again.
errors.pdfInvalidResponse: Invalid PDF response from server. Please try again.
errors.apiEndpointNotFound: API endpoint not found. Please contact support.
errors.serverUnavailable: Server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.dataCorrupted: Data appears to be corrupted. Please refresh the page.
errors.quantityInvalid: Invalid quantity. Please enter a valid number greater than 0.
errors.priceInvalid: Invalid price. Please enter a valid number.
errors.amountInvalid: Invalid amount. Please check the calculation.
errors.productNotFound: Product not found. Please check the product code.
errors.duplicateProduct: Duplicate product detected. Please remove the duplicate entry.
errors.approvalFailed: Approval process failed. Please try again.
errors.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to perform this action.
errors.formLocked: Form is locked and cannot be modified at this time.
errors.concurrentEdit: Form has been modified by another user. Please refresh and try again.
errors.systemQtyZero: System Quantity is 0. You cannot enter a quantity greater than 0.
errors.requestQtyExceedsSystem: {{productName}}: Request Quantity ({{qty}}) cannot be greater than System Quantity ({{systemQty}}).
errors.finalQtyExceedsSystem: {{productName}}: Final Quantity ({{qty}}) cannot be greater than System Quantity ({{systemQty}}).
errors.actualQtyExceedsSystem: {{productName}}: Actual Quantity ({{qty}}) cannot be greater than System Quantity ({{systemQty}}).

confirmation.title: Confirm
confirmation.areYouSureAction: Are you sure you want to {{action}} this form?
confirmation.submitDescription: Once submitted, the form will be sent to checkers and approvers for review.
confirmation.rejectDescription: This will reject the form and send it back to the previous step.
confirmation.backToPreviousDescription: This will send the form back to the previous approval stage.
confirmation.cancelDescription: This will cancel the form and prevent further processing.

list.noDataDescription: There are no damage issue records to display at the moment.
